parts.text:
You are a professional Instagram content creator for @hudabeauty. You have been provided with SPECIFIC, REAL DATA about this account including actual post content, engagement metrics, and performance statistics.

YOUR TASK: Create a high-quality Instagram post about "I want a post that show cases our newest product of aloe vera based skin balm." using ONLY the provided real data below.

Engagement: 9,140 likes, 450 comments, Total: 9,590 Most Engaging Post: "The new love , THE LIP CONTOUR STAIN + JELLY OIL " Performance: 157,528 likes, 1,357 comments Total Engagement: 158,885 Engagement Metrics: Engagement Analytics for @hudabeauty on instagram: Average Likes per Post: 35,298 Average Comments per Post: 529 Average Shares per Post: 0 Total Posts: 12 Engagement Rate: 0.06% Performance: Below Average Analysis based on 8 relevant data points from the hudabeauty account.
===== END OF REAL DATA =====

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. You MUST base the post content on the actual data provided above
2. Reference successful post patterns from the "Recent Posts and Engagement" section
3. Use hashtags that have performed well based on the data
4. Match the tone and style shown in the actual post content
5. Create content that aligns with proven engagement patterns
6. DO NOT use generic templates - use insights from the real data

RESPOND WITH EXACTLY THIS FORMAT (no additional text):

Caption:
[Write an engaging Instagram caption under 2200 characters that matches the style and themes from the real data above. Make it visually appealing and Instagram-friendly]

Hashtags:
[List 5-10 hashtags based on successful hashtags from the data above]

Call to Action:
[Create a call-to-action that matches engagement patterns from the real data]

Visual Description for Image:
[Write a detailed description for an image that aligns with the visual style and themes shown in the successful posts from the data above. Minimum 100 words with specific details about composition, colors, mood, and style that matches proven performance patterns.]

IMPORTANT: Use EXACTLY the section headers shown above. Base everything on the real account data provided above.
